original_title: What's in the Bible? Volume 13: God's Kingdom Comes!
overview: Volume 13: God's Kingdom Comes! will take your family through the final books of the Bible - the General Epistles and Revelation! Learn more about what it means to be a follower of Jesus from the books of Hebrews and James, and then watch Buck Denver and friends learn about John's visions in Revelation and the coming kingdom of God!
title: What's in the Bible? Volume 13: God's Kingdom Comes!
